mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, pwd, type, name, tell, status, confirm, grade, role, joindate, finaldate) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{type}, #{name}, #{tell}, 1, #{confirm}, '일반', 'ROLE_USER', now(), now())
mapper.select:
SELECT m.* FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rnum, tmp.* FROM MEMBERLISTVIEW AS tmp, (SELECT @rownum:=0) as r
WHERE tmp.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
WHERE ${key} = CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
ORDER BY tmp.mno DESC ) AS m WHERE rnum <= #{end} AND rnum >= #{start}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, tell = #{tell}, birth = #{birth}, status = #{status}, grade = #{grade}, WHERE id = #{id}
